Articles.Content:
As time progresses, my ships seem to gain a weird vibration. even the tectures on the command pod vibrate relative to each other. This is reset after a quicksave/quickload, but seems to progress even under timewarp.

Edited July 14, 2017 by EnderKid2
Image didn't work

If use "Autostrut", try to disable it everywhere and disable SAS too. Avoid clipping-inside anything, which is core reason.

I had my craft go suddenly spaghetti, if there is even slightest collision between elements and these were directly or indirectly autostrut'ed. It seems to add "yo-yo" or "echo" effect to small force, vibrating everything into kraken.

Like this, but also in space.

Another option is to use Kerbal Joint Reinforcement mod, which specifically compensates tensions on joints between bigger and smaller parts, preventing any "free play".

Edited July 14, 2017 by Kerbal101
What is really, really weird is that the individual textures on the parts vibrate as well.
